豁.definition: open; clear; liberal-minded; generous; to exempt; to remit

豁出去.definition: to throw caution to the wind; to press one's luck; to go for broke

豁楞.definition: (dialect) (variant of 劐弄[huo1 leng5]) to mix; to stir; to make trouble

豁然.definition: wide and open; a flash of understanding

豁然開朗.definition: suddenly opens up to a wide panorama (idiom); to come to a wide clearing; fig. everything becomes clear at once; to achieve speedy enlightenment
